revised_title: Degenerations and Lesions of the Cerebellum: A Study of Brain and Spinal Cord
tldr: This article discusses the degenerations and lesions of the cerebellum and their effects on the brain and spinal cord. The author examines the consequences of experimental lesions of the cerebellum, including the degeneration of various peduncles and tracts. The study provides insights into the complex connections and pathways within the brain and contributes to the understanding of brain pathology.
